2020

Betts MG et al. Extinction filters mediate the global effects of habitat fragmentation for animals.Science 366: 1236–1239.

Cameron AC, Page RB, Watling JI, Hickerson C-AH & Anthony CD. Using a comparative approach to investigate the relationship between landscape and genetic connectivity among woodland salamander populations. Conservation Genetics 20: 1265-1280.

Is habitat fragmentation bad for biodiversity? Biological Conservation 230: 179—186.
